blaze.desc: Highlights the blaze slayer in the color of the current attunement

desc: Turns most carpets in the dwarven mines <red>red</red> to make them more visible.
<yellow>Only updates on chunk refresh, use <bold>F3+A</bold> to force a refresh
Send a chat or party message when you enter a Mineshaft.
Will send in chat if not in a party.

announce-type.desc: The type of message to send when you enter a Mineshaft.

waypoint.desc: Show a waypoint on all possible Corpse Locations in a Mineshaft.

profile_in_chat.desc: Show the profile icon in chat messages.
